short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension that integrates LegisMe for iOS and Android with Google Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension that integrates with the LegisMe app available on iOS and Android.

Note: You must have a LegisMe account in order to use this extension.

Influence your elected representatives in Congress by "voting" on the same legislation that they do. LegisMe for Chrome finds bills that are relevant to the news articles you reading.

Supported news websites (so far):
- nytimes.com
- cnn.com
- politico.com
- aplus.com
- washingtonpost.com
- foxnews.com
- economist.com
